*div1 type="summary"* *p*M. Slocum to Austin, March 27, 1827. Disapproval of the insurgents. Purchase of Texas.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Natchitoches */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="03-27-1827">March 27. 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr. Sir,*/p*
*p*I have thro the politeness of *person_mentioned*Mr Cable*/person_mentioned*, recd your favour of the *date_mentioned n="03-21-1827">24th inst*/date_mentioned*. It gives me pleasure to learn that you do not attribute to me bad motives for the course I have pursued relative to the late unfortunate troubles which have been brought upon your *location_mentioned*province*/location_mentioned* by the late *person_mentioned*Fredonians*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I can assure you that every *person_mentioned*person */person_mentioned*in this *location_mentioned*place */location_mentioned*is opposed to the conduct of these late *person_mentioned*renegades*/person_mentioned*—and also throought the *location_mentioned*U. S.*/location_mentioned* with the exception of a few who would be glad to embark in any course, however desperate and unprincipled—*/p*
*p*You have probably ere this heard the report that *person_mentioned*H. Clay, sec. of State*/person_mentioned* has wrote to a *person_mentioned*Mr. Stockton, of *location_mentioned*Virginia*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* that the U. S, were in Treaty for the purchase of the *location_mentioned*Province of Texas*/location_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Mr. Clay*/person_mentioned*, has denied ever having intimated any thing of that nature— If convenient I should be glad to obtain the Constitution of the *location_mentioned*Province of Texas and Cohuila*/location_mentioned*, as soon as it is published for the purpose of republishing in English—Also any *person_mentioned*Mexican */person_mentioned*papers you may be able to spare for the purpose of translation I will send you nothern papers at every convenient opportunity, which I am in hopes I will be able to do regularly thro the kind aid of *person_mentioned*Mr Cable*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Milton Slocum*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*P. S. If you will send *location_mentioned*papers */location_mentioned*or any communications you may wish to make *person_mentioned*Mr. Durst*/person_mentioned*, he will forward them on*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*M. S.*/person_mentioned**/p*
[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Col: S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches, Tex*/location_mentioned*
